title: anbu varam
sahitya:
anbu varam taruvAi ennappanE Ananda sadguruvE



anupallavi



un pAdam paTri nAn ulagirkku nalam sheyyum



caraNam 1



anniyaminri nAn unnuDan onrAgi mannuyir mannanIyenruNar



caraNam 2



ellAm shivanaruL ellAm shivan sheyal ellAm shivamayam enru toNDu

sheyyum
